title: Alt★Hero site
author: VD
content_html:
Since there is a fair amount of interest in an Alt★Hero site, I’m considering moving down the goal to 135k and adding a new goal at 150k. To increase the chances the campaign gets there, I’m also thinking of adding a site-related Reward for those specifically backing a site.

What should the amount be and what are some of the possible site-related rewards we could give that would be of interest?

Discuss amongst yourselves.
